ar.short_description: Specifies an aspect ratio to maintain when resizing and cropping the image

bg.short_description: Colors the background of padded and partially-transparent images.

blend-align.short_description: Changes the blend alignment relative to the parent image.

blend-alpha.short_description: Changes the alpha of the blend image.

blend-color.short_description: Specifies a color to use when applying the blend.

blend-crop.short_description: Specifies the type of crop for blend images.

blend-fit.short_description: Specifies the fit mode for blend images.

blend-h.short_description: Adjusts the height of the blend image.

blend-mode.short_description: Sets the blend mode for a blend image.

blend-pad.short_description: Applies padding to the blend image.

blend-size.short_description: Adjusts the size of the blend image.

blend-w.short_description: Adjusts the width of the blend image.

blend-x.short_description: Adjusts the x-offset of the blend image relative to its parent.

blend-y.short_description: Adjusts the y-offset of the blend image relative to its parent.

blend.short_description: Specifies the location of the blend image.

blur.short_description: Applies a gaussian blur to an image.

border-bottom.short_description: Sets bottom border of an image.

border-left.short_description: Sets left border of an image.

border-radius-inner.short_description: Sets the inner radius of the image's border in pixels.

border-radius.short_description: Sets the outer radius of the image's border in pixels.

border-right.short_description: Sets right border of an image.

border-top.short_description: Sets top border of an image.

border.short_description: Applies a border to an image.

bri.short_description: Adjusts the brightness of the source image.

ch.short_description: Sets one or more Client-Hints headers

chromasub.short_description: Specifies the output chroma subsampling rate.

colorquant.short_description: Limits the number of unique colors in an image.

colors.short_description: Specifies how many colors to include in a palette-extraction response.

con.short_description: Adjusts the contrast of the source image.

corner-radius.short_description: Specifies the radius value for a rounded corner mask.

crop.short_description: Specifies how to crop an image.

cs.short_description: Specifies the color space of the output image.

dl.short_description: Forces a URL to use send-file in its response.

dpi.short_description: Sets the DPI value in the EXIF header.

dpr.short_description: Adjusts the device-pixel ratio of the output image.

duotone-alpha.short_description: Changes the alpha of the duotone effect atop the source image.

duotone.short_description: Applies a duotone effect to the source image.

exp.short_description: Adjusts the exposure of the output image.

expires.short_description: A Unix timestamp specifying a UTC time. Requests made to this URL after that time will output a 404 status code.

faceindex.short_description: Selects a face to crop to.

facepad.short_description: Adjusts padding around a selected face.

faces.short_description: Specifies that face data should be included in output when combined with `fm=json`.

fill-color.short_description: Sets the fill color for images with additional space created by the fit setting

fill.short_description: Determines how to fill in additional space created by the fit setting

fit.short_description: Specifies how to map the source image to the output image dimensions.

flip.short_description: Flips an image on a specified axis.

fm.short_description: Changes the format of the output image.

fp-debug.short_description: Displays crosshairs identifying the location of the set focal point

fp-x.short_description: Sets the relative horizontal value for the focal point of an image

fp-y.short_description: Sets the relative vertical value for the focal point of an image

fp-z.short_description: Sets the relative zoom value for the focal point of an image

gam.short_description: Adjusts the gamma of the source image.

grid-colors.short_description: Sets grid colors for the transparency checkerboard grid.

grid-size.short_description: Sets grid size for the transparency checkerboard grid.

h.short_description: Adjusts the height of the output image.

high.short_description: Adjusts the highlights of the source image.

htn.short_description: Applies a half-tone effect to the source image.

hue.short_description: Adjusts the hue of the source image.

invert.short_description: Inverts the colors on the source image.

lossless.short_description: Specifies that the output image should be a lossless variant.

mark-align.short_description: Changes the watermark alignment relative to the parent image.

mark-alpha.short_description: Changes the alpha of the watermark image.

mark-base.short_description: Changes base URL of the watermark image.

mark-fit.short_description: Specifies the fit mode for watermark images.

mark-h.short_description: Adjusts the height of the watermark image.

mark-pad.short_description: Applies padding to the watermark image.

mark-rot.short_description: Rotates a watermark or tiled watermarks by a specified number of degrees.

mark-scale.short_description: Adjusts the scale of the watermark image.

mark-w.short_description: Adjusts the width of the watermark image.

mark-x.short_description: Adjusts the x-offset of the watermark image relative to its parent.

mark-y.short_description: Adjusts the y-offset of the watermark image relative to its parent.

mark.short_description: Specifies the location of the watermark image.

mask-bg.short_description: Colors the background of the transparent mask area of images

mask.short_description: Defines the type of mask and specifies the URL if that type is selected.

max-h.short_description: Specifies the maximum height of the output image in pixels.

max-w.short_description: Specifies the maximum width of the output image in pixels.

min-h.short_description: Specifies the minimum height of the output image in pixels.

min-w.short_description: Specifies the minimum width of the output image in pixels.

monochrome.short_description: Applies a monochrome effect to the source image.

nr.short_description: Reduces the noise in an image.

nrs.short_description: Provides a threshold by which to sharpen an image.

pad-bottom.short_description: Sets bottom padding of an image.

pad-left.short_description: Sets left padding of an image.

pad-right.short_description: Sets right padding of an image.

pad-top.short_description: Sets top padding of an image.

page.short_description: Selects a page from a PDF for display.

palette.short_description: Specifies an output format for palette-extraction.

prefix.short_description: Specifies a CSS prefix for all classes in palette-extraction.

px.short_description: Applies a pixelation effect to an image.

q.short_description: Adjusts the quality of an output image.

rect.short_description: Crops an image to a specified rectangle.

rot.short_description: Rotates an image by a specified number of degrees.

sat.short_description: Adjusts the saturation of an image.

sepia.short_description: Applies a sepia effect to an image.

shad.short_description: Adjusts the highlights of the source image.

sharp.short_description: Adjusts the sharpness of the source image.

transparency.short_description: Adds checkerboard behind images which support transparency.

trim-color.short_description: Specifies a trim color on a trim operation.

trim-md.short_description: Specifies the mean difference on a trim operation.

trim-pad.short_description: Pads the area of the source image before trimming.

trim-sd.short_description: Specifies the standard deviation on a trim operation.

trim-tol.short_description: Specifies the tolerance on a trim operation.

txt-align.short_description: Sets the vertical and horizontal alignment of rendered text relative to the base image.

txt-clip.short_description: Sets the clipping properties of rendered text.

txt-color.short_description: Specifies the color of rendered text.

txt-fit.short_description: Specifies the fit approach for rendered text.

txt-font.short_description: Selects a font for rendered text.

txt-lead.short_description: Sets the leading (line spacing) for rendered text. Only works on the multi-line text endpoint.

txt-lig.short_description: Controls the level of ligature substitution

txt-line.short_description: Outlines the rendered text with a specified color.

txt-pad.short_description: Specifies the padding (in device-independent pixels) between a textbox and the edges of the base image.

txt-shad.short_description: Applies a shadow to rendered text.

txt-size.short_description: Sets the font size of rendered text.

txt-track.short_description: Sets the tracking (letter spacing) for rendered text. Only works on the multi-line text endpoint.

txt-width.short_description: Sets the width of rendered text.

txt.short_description: Sets the text string to render.

usm.short_description: Sharpens the source image using an unsharp mask.

usmrad.short_description: Specifies the radius for an unsharp mask operation.

vib.short_description: Adjusts the vibrance of an image.

w.short_description: Adjusts the width of the output image.
